                  abs PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  2800              CMP      r0,#0
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  da01              BGE      |L1.8|
000004  4240              RSBS     r0,r0,#0
000006  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L1.8|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
000008  4770              BX       lr
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  clr_scrn PROC
;;;18     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;19     void clr_scrn(void)
00000a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
;;;20     {
;;;21     char i;
;;;22     for (i=0;i<LCD_SIZE;i++)
;;;23     	{
;;;24     	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';
00000c  4afc              LDR      r2,|L1.1024|
00000e  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
                  |L1.16|
000010  5411              STRB     r1,[r2,r0]
000012  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;22
000014  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;22
000016  28c8              CMP      r0,#0xc8              ;22
000018  d3fa              BCC      |L1.16|
;;;25     	}
;;;26     }
00001a  4770              BX       lr
;;;27     
                          ENDP

                  find PROC
;;;28     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;29     char find(char xy)
00001c  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;30     {
;;;31     char i=0;
00001e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
;;;32     do i++;
;;;33     while ((lcd_buffer[i]!=xy)&&(i<LCD_SIZE));
000020  4af7              LDR      r2,|L1.1024|
                  |L1.34|
000022  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;32
000024  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;32
000026  5c13              LDRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000028  428b              CMP      r3,r1
00002a  d001              BEQ      |L1.48|
00002c  28c8              CMP      r0,#0xc8
00002e  d3f8              BCC      |L1.34|
                  |L1.48|
;;;34     //if(i==(LCD_SIZE)) i++;
;;;35     return i;
;;;36     }
000030  4770              BX       lr
;;;37     
                          ENDP

                  bin2bcd_int PROC
;;;39     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;40     void bin2bcd_int(unsigned int in)
000032  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;41     {
;;;42     
;;;43     char i=5;
;;;44     for(i=0;i<5;i++)
000034  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
;;;45     	{
;;;46     	dig[i]=in%10;
000036  4cf3              LDR      r4,|L1.1028|
000038  220a              MOVS     r2,#0xa
                  |L1.58|
00003a  4603              MOV      r3,r0
00003c  fbb0f0f2          UDIV     r0,r0,r2
000040  fb023310          MLS      r3,r2,r0,r3
000044  5463              STRB     r3,[r4,r1]
000046  1c49              ADDS     r1,r1,#1              ;44
000048  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;44
00004a  2905              CMP      r1,#5                 ;44
00004c  d3f5              BCC      |L1.58|
;;;47     	in/=10;
;;;48     	}   
;;;49     }
00004e  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;50     //-----------------------------------------------
                          ENDP

                  bcd2lcd_zero PROC
;;;51     void bcd2lcd_zero(char sig)
000050  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;52     {
;;;53     char i;
;;;54     zero_on=1;
000052  4ded              LDR      r5,|L1.1032|
000054  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000056  7029              STRB     r1,[r5,#0]
;;;55     for (i=5;i>0;i--)
000058  2105              MOVS     r1,#5
;;;56     	{
;;;57     	if(zero_on&&(!dig[i-1])&&(i>sig))
;;;58     		{
;;;59     		dig[i-1]=0x20;
00005a  2620              MOVS     r6,#0x20
00005c  4be9              LDR      r3,|L1.1028|
00005e  2700              MOVS     r7,#0                 ;54
                  |L1.96|
000060  782a              LDRB     r2,[r5,#0]            ;57  ; zero_on
000062  b142              CBZ      r2,|L1.118|
000064  185a              ADDS     r2,r3,r1              ;57
000066  f8124c01          LDRB     r4,[r2,#-1]           ;57
00006a  b924              CBNZ     r4,|L1.118|
00006c  4281              CMP      r1,r0                 ;57
00006e  d902              BLS      |L1.118|
000070  f8026c01          STRB     r6,[r2,#-1]
000074  e005              B        |L1.130|
                  |L1.118|
;;;60     		}
;;;61     	else
;;;62     		{
;;;63     		dig[i-1]=dig[i-1]+0x30;
000076  185a              ADDS     r2,r3,r1
000078  f8124d01          LDRB     r4,[r2,#-1]!
00007c  3430              ADDS     r4,r4,#0x30
00007e  7014              STRB     r4,[r2,#0]
;;;64     		zero_on=0;
000080  702f              STRB     r7,[r5,#0]
                  |L1.130|
000082  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1              ;55
000084  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;55
000086  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;55
000088  d1ea              BNE      |L1.96|
;;;65     		}	
;;;66     	}
;;;67     }             
00008a  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;68     
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd_m PROC
;;;69     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;70     void int2lcd_m(signed short in,char xy,char des)
00008c  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;71     {
00008e  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000090  4614              MOV      r4,r2
;;;72     char i;
;;;73     char n;
;;;74     char bMinus;
;;;75     bMinus=0;
;;;76     if(in<0)
000092  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000094  da02              BGE      |L1.156|
;;;77     	{
;;;78     	bMinus=1;
;;;79     	in=(~in+1);
000096  43c0              MVNS     r0,r0
000098  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
00009a  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L1.156|
;;;80     	}
;;;81     bin2bcd_int(in);
00009c  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;82     bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
0000a0  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
0000a2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0000a4  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;83     i=find(xy);
0000a8  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0000aa  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;84     if(i!=255)
0000ae  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
0000b0  d01e              BEQ      |L1.240|
;;;85     	{
;;;86     	for (n=0;n<5;n++)
0000b2  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
;;;87     		{ 
;;;88     		if(n<des)
;;;89     			{
;;;90     			lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
0000b4  4dd3              LDR      r5,|L1.1028|
0000b6  4ad2              LDR      r2,|L1.1024|
                  |L1.184|
0000b8  42a1              CMP      r1,r4                 ;88
0000ba  d202              BCS      |L1.194|
0000bc  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
0000be  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
0000c0  e010              B        |L1.228|
                  |L1.194|
;;;91     			} 
;;;92     		else if (n==des)
0000c2  d108              BNE      |L1.214|
;;;93        			{
;;;94        			lcd_buffer[i]='.';
0000c4  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
0000c8  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
;;;95        			lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
0000ca  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
0000ce  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
0000d0  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
0000d4  e006              B        |L1.228|
                  |L1.214|
;;;96        			} 	  
;;;97     		else if((n>=des)&&(dig[n]!=0x20))
0000d6  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
0000d8  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
0000da  d003              BEQ      |L1.228|
;;;98     			{
;;;99     			if(!des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	
0000dc  b14c              CBZ      r4,|L1.242|
;;;100    			else lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
0000de  1816              ADDS     r6,r2,r0
0000e0  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.228|
;;;101       			}
;;;102       		else if((n>=des)&&(dig[n]!=0x20)&&(bMinus))
;;;103    	   		{
;;;104    			if(!des)lcd_buffer[i]='-';	
;;;105    			else lcd_buffer[i-1]='-';
;;;106    			n=5;
;;;107       			}	   
;;;108    		i--;	
0000e4  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
0000e6  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0000e8  1c49              ADDS     r1,r1,#1              ;86
0000ea  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;86
0000ec  2905              CMP      r1,#5                 ;86
0000ee  d3e3              BCC      |L1.184|
                  |L1.240|
;;;109    		}
;;;110    	}
;;;111    }
0000f0  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L1.242|
0000f2  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]            ;99
0000f4  e7f6              B        |L1.228|
;;;112    
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd_mm PROC
;;;113    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;114    void int2lcd_mm(signed short in,char xy,char des)
0000f6  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;115    {

;;;116    char i;
;;;117    char n;
;;;118    char minus='+';
;;;119    if(in<0)

0000fe  da01              BGE      |L1.260|
;;;120    	{
;;;121    	in=-in;
000100  4240              RSBS     r0,r0,#0
000102  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L1.260|
;;;122    	minus='-';
;;;123    	}
;;;124    minus='-';	
000104  262d              MOVS     r6,#0x2d
;;;125    bin2bcd_int(in);
000106  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;126    bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);

00010c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00010e  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;127    i=find(xy);
000112  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000114  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;128    for (n=0;n<5;n++)

;;;129    	{
;;;130       	if(!des&&(dig[n]!=' '))
00011a  4aba              LDR      r2,|L1.1028|
;;;131       		{
;;;132       		if((dig[n+1]==' ')&&(minus=='-'))lcd_buffer[i-1]='-';

                  |L1.286|

000122  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20              ;130
000124  d00c              BEQ      |L1.320|

00012e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d

000136  272d              MOVS     r7,#0x2d
000138  f80c7c01          STRB     r7,[r12,#-1]
                  |L1.316|
;;;133       		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	 
00013c  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
00013e  e014              B        |L1.362|
                  |L1.320|
;;;134       		}
;;;135       	else 
;;;136       		{
;;;137       		if(n<des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];

000142  d202              BCS      |L1.330|
000144  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000146  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000148  e00f              B        |L1.362|
                  |L1.330|
;;;138       		else if (n==des)
00014a  d108              BNE      |L1.350|
;;;139       			{
;;;140       			lcd_buffer[i]='.';
00014c  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000150  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
;;;141       			lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];

000156  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000158  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00015c  e005              B        |L1.362|
                  |L1.350|
;;;142       			} 
;;;143       		else if ((n>des)&&(dig[n]!=' ')) lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];

000160  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000162  d002              BEQ      |L1.362|
000164  1827              ADDS     r7,r4,r0
000166  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
                  |L1.362|
;;;144       		else if ((minus=='-')&&(n>des)&&(dig[n]!=' ')&&(dig[n+1]==' ')) lcd_buffer[i]='-';  		
;;;145       		}  
;;;146    		
;;;147    	i--;

00016c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00016e  1c49              ADDS     r1,r1,#1              ;128
000170  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;128
000172  2905              CMP      r1,#5                 ;128

;;;148    	}
;;;149    }

;;;150    
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd_mmm PROC
;;;151    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;152    void int2lcd_mmm(signed short in,char xy,char des)
000178  b5fe              PUSH     {r1-r7,lr}
;;;153    {
00017a  4603              MOV      r3,r0
;;;154    signed char i;
;;;155    char n;
;;;156    char s[10];
;;;157    char minus='+';
00017c  272b              MOVS     r7,#0x2b
;;;158    char zero_on;
;;;159    char simb_num;
;;;160    
;;;161    if(in<0)
00017e  2b00              CMP      r3,#0
000180  da02              BGE      |L1.392|
;;;162    	{
;;;163    	in=-in;
000182  4258              RSBS     r0,r3,#0
000184  b203              SXTH     r3,r0
;;;164    	minus='-';
000186  272d              MOVS     r7,#0x2d
                  |L1.392|
;;;165    	}
;;;166    
;;;167    for(i=0;i<10;i++)
000188  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
;;;168    	{
;;;169    	s[i]=in%10;
00018a  240a              MOVS     r4,#0xa
00018c  466d              MOV      r5,sp                 ;156
                  |L1.398|
00018e  fb93f6f4          SDIV     r6,r3,r4
000192  fb043316          MLS      r3,r4,r6,r3
000196  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;170    	in/=10;
000198  b233              SXTH     r3,r6
00019a  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;167
00019c  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;167
00019e  280a              CMP      r0,#0xa               ;167
0001a0  dbf5              BLT      |L1.398|
;;;171    	}   
;;;172    
;;;173    zero_on=1;
0001a2  2301              MOVS     r3,#1
;;;174    simb_num=0;
0001a4  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
;;;175    
;;;176    for (i=9;i>=0;i--)
0001a6  2009              MOVS     r0,#9
;;;177    	{
;;;178    	if(zero_on&&(!s[i])&&(i>(des)))
;;;179    	     {
;;;180    	     s[i]=0x20;
0001a8  2620              MOVS     r6,#0x20
                  |L1.426|
0001aa  b143              CBZ      r3,|L1.446|
0001ac  f815c000          LDRB     r12,[r5,r0]           ;178
0001b0  f1bc0f00          CMP      r12,#0                ;178
0001b4  d103              BNE      |L1.446|
0001b6  4290              CMP      r0,r2                 ;178
0001b8  dd01              BLE      |L1.446|
0001ba  542e              STRB     r6,[r5,r0]
0001bc  e005              B        |L1.458|
                  |L1.446|
;;;181    	     }
;;;182    	else 
;;;183    	     {
;;;184    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;
0001be  5c2b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r0]
0001c0  3330              ADDS     r3,r3,#0x30
0001c2  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;185    	     zero_on=0;
0001c4  2300              MOVS     r3,#0
;;;186    	     simb_num++;
0001c6  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1
0001c8  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.458|
0001ca  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;176
0001cc  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;176
0001ce  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;176
0001d0  daeb              BGE      |L1.426|
;;;187    	     }
;;;188    	 }
;;;189    	          
;;;190    if(minus=='-')	
0001d2  2f2d              CMP      r7,#0x2d
0001d4  d103              BNE      |L1.478|
;;;191         {
;;;192         s[simb_num++]=minus; 
0001d6  4620              MOV      r0,r4
0001d8  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1
0001da  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
0001dc  542f              STRB     r7,[r5,r0]
                  |L1.478|
;;;193         }    
;;;194    if(des)
0001de  b16a              CBZ      r2,|L1.508|
;;;195         {
;;;196         for(i=simb_num;i>des;i--)
0001e0  b260              SXTB     r0,r4
0001e2  e005              B        |L1.496|
                  |L1.484|
;;;197              {
;;;198              s[i]=s[i-1];

0001e6  f8133c01          LDRB     r3,[r3,#-1]
0001ea  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
0001ec  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;196
0001ee  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;196
                  |L1.496|
0001f0  4290              CMP      r0,r2                 ;196
0001f2  dcf7              BGT      |L1.484|
;;;199              }
;;;200         s[des]='.';
0001f4  202e              MOVS     r0,#0x2e
0001f6  54a8              STRB     r0,[r5,r2]
;;;201         simb_num++;     
0001f8  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1
0001fa  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.508|
;;;202         }
;;;203    	
;;;204    n=find(xy);
0001fc  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0001fe  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;205    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)
000202  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
;;;206    	{
;;;207         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];
000204  4a7e              LDR      r2,|L1.1024|
000206  e004              B        |L1.530|
                  |L1.520|
000208  1a46              SUBS     r6,r0,r1
00020a  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
00020c  5593              STRB     r3,[r2,r6]

000210  b249              SXTB     r1,r1                 ;205
                  |L1.530|
000212  42a1              CMP      r1,r4                 ;205
000214  dbf8              BLT      |L1.520|
;;;208    	}
;;;209    }
000216  bdfe              POP      {r1-r7,pc}
;;;210    
                          ENDP

                  long2lcd_mmm PROC
;;;211    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;212    void long2lcd_mmm(signed long in,char xy,char des)
000218  b5fe              PUSH     {r1-r7,lr}
;;;213    {
00021a  4603              MOV      r3,r0
;;;214    signed char i;
;;;215    char n;
;;;216    char s[10];
;;;217    char minus='+';
00021c  272b              MOVS     r7,#0x2b
;;;218    char zero_on;
;;;219    char simb_num;
;;;220    
;;;221    if(in<0)
00021e  2b00              CMP      r3,#0
000220  da01              BGE      |L1.550|
;;;222    	{
;;;223    	in=-in;
000222  425b              RSBS     r3,r3,#0
;;;224    	minus='-';
000224  272d              MOVS     r7,#0x2d
                  |L1.550|
;;;225    	}
;;;226    
;;;227    for(i=0;i<10;i++)
000226  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
;;;228    	{
;;;229    	s[i]=in%10;
000228  240a              MOVS     r4,#0xa
00022a  466d              MOV      r5,sp                 ;216
                  |L1.556|
00022c  461e              MOV      r6,r3
00022e  fb93f3f4          SDIV     r3,r3,r4
000232  fb046613          MLS      r6,r4,r3,r6
000236  542e              STRB     r6,[r5,r0]
000238  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;227
00023a  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;227
00023c  280a              CMP      r0,#0xa               ;227
00023e  dbf5              BLT      |L1.556|
;;;230    	in/=10;
;;;231    	}   
;;;232    
;;;233    zero_on=1;
000240  2301              MOVS     r3,#1
;;;234    simb_num=0;
000242  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
;;;235    
;;;236    for (i=9;i>=0;i--)
000244  2009              MOVS     r0,#9
;;;237    	{
;;;238    	if(zero_on&&(!s[i])&&(i>(des)))
;;;239    	     {
;;;240    	     s[i]=0x20;
000246  2620              MOVS     r6,#0x20
                  |L1.584|
000248  b143              CBZ      r3,|L1.604|
00024a  f815c000          LDRB     r12,[r5,r0]           ;238
00024e  f1bc0f00          CMP      r12,#0                ;238
000252  d103              BNE      |L1.604|
000254  4290              CMP      r0,r2                 ;238
000256  dd01              BLE      |L1.604|
000258  542e              STRB     r6,[r5,r0]
00025a  e005              B        |L1.616|
                  |L1.604|
;;;241    	     }
;;;242    	else 
;;;243    	     {
;;;244    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;
00025c  5c2b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r0]
00025e  3330              ADDS     r3,r3,#0x30
000260  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;245    	     zero_on=0;
000262  2300              MOVS     r3,#0
;;;246    	     simb_num++;
000264  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1
000266  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.616|
000268  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;236
00026a  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;236
00026c  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;236
00026e  daeb              BGE      |L1.584|
;;;247    	     }
;;;248    	 }
;;;249    	          
;;;250    if(minus=='-')	
000270  2f2d              CMP      r7,#0x2d
000272  d103              BNE      |L1.636|
;;;251         {
;;;252         s[simb_num++]=minus; 
000274  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000276  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1
000278  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
00027a  542f              STRB     r7,[r5,r0]
                  |L1.636|
;;;253         }    
;;;254    if(des)
00027c  b16a              CBZ      r2,|L1.666|
;;;255         {
;;;256         for(i=simb_num;i>des;i--)
00027e  b260              SXTB     r0,r4
000280  e005              B        |L1.654|
                  |L1.642|
;;;257              {
;;;258              s[i]=s[i-1];
000282  182b              ADDS     r3,r5,r0
000284  f8133c01          LDRB     r3,[r3,#-1]
000288  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
00028a  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;256
00028c  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;256
                  |L1.654|
00028e  4290              CMP      r0,r2                 ;256
000290  dcf7              BGT      |L1.642|
;;;259              }
;;;260         s[des]='.';
000292  202e              MOVS     r0,#0x2e
000294  54a8              STRB     r0,[r5,r2]
;;;261         simb_num++;     
000296  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1
000298  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.666|
;;;262         }
;;;263    	
;;;264    n=find(xy);
00029a  4608              MOV      r0,r1
00029c  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;265    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)
0002a0  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
;;;266    	{
;;;267         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];
0002a2  4a57              LDR      r2,|L1.1024|
0002a4  e004              B        |L1.688|
                  |L1.678|
0002a6  1a46              SUBS     r6,r0,r1
0002a8  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
0002aa  5593              STRB     r3,[r2,r6]
0002ac  1c49              ADDS     r1,r1,#1              ;265
0002ae  b249              SXTB     r1,r1                 ;265
                  |L1.688|
0002b0  42a1              CMP      r1,r4                 ;265
0002b2  dbf8              BLT      |L1.678|
;;;268    	}
;;;269    }
0002b4  bdfe              POP      {r1-r7,pc}
;;;270    
                          ENDP

                  long2lcdyx_mmm PROC
;;;271    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;272    void long2lcdyx_mmm(signed long in,char y,char x,char des)
0002b6  e92d41fe          PUSH     {r1-r8,lr}
;;;273    {
;;;274    signed char i;
;;;275    char n;
;;;276    char s[10];
;;;277    char minus='+';
0002ba  f04f0c2b          MOV      r12,#0x2b
;;;278    char zero_on;
;;;279    char simb_num;
;;;280    
;;;281    if(in<0)
0002be  2800              CMP      r0,#0
0002c0  da02              BGE      |L1.712|
;;;282    	{
;;;283    	in=-in;
0002c2  4240              RSBS     r0,r0,#0
;;;284    	minus='-';
0002c4  f04f0c2d          MOV      r12,#0x2d
                  |L1.712|
;;;285    	}
;;;286    
;;;287    for(i=0;i<10;i++)
0002c8  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
;;;288    	{
;;;289    	s[i]=in%10;
0002ca  250a              MOVS     r5,#0xa
0002cc  466f              MOV      r7,sp                 ;276
                  |L1.718|
0002ce  4606              MOV      r6,r0
0002d0  fb90f0f5          SDIV     r0,r0,r5
0002d4  fb056610          MLS      r6,r5,r0,r6
0002d8  553e              STRB     r6,[r7,r4]
0002da  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1              ;287
0002dc  b264              SXTB     r4,r4                 ;287
0002de  2c0a              CMP      r4,#0xa               ;287
0002e0  dbf5              BLT      |L1.718|
;;;290    	in/=10;
;;;291    	}   
;;;292    
;;;293    zero_on=1;
0002e2  2501              MOVS     r5,#1
;;;294    simb_num=0;
0002e4  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
;;;295    
;;;296    for (i=9;i>=0;i--)
0002e6  2009              MOVS     r0,#9
;;;297    	{
;;;298    	if(zero_on&&(!s[i])&&(i>(des)))
;;;299    	     {
;;;300    	     s[i]=0x20;
0002e8  2620              MOVS     r6,#0x20
                  |L1.746|
0002ea  b145              CBZ      r5,|L1.766|
0002ec  f8178000          LDRB     r8,[r7,r0]            ;298
0002f0  f1b80f00          CMP      r8,#0                 ;298
0002f4  d103              BNE      |L1.766|
0002f6  4298              CMP      r0,r3                 ;298
0002f8  dd01              BLE      |L1.766|
0002fa  543e              STRB     r6,[r7,r0]
0002fc  e005              B        |L1.778|
                  |L1.766|
;;;301    	     }
;;;302    	else 
;;;303    	     {
;;;304    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;
0002fe  5c3d              LDRB     r5,[r7,r0]
000300  3530              ADDS     r5,r5,#0x30
000302  543d              STRB     r5,[r7,r0]
;;;305    	     zero_on=0;
000304  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
;;;306    	     simb_num++;
000306  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1
000308  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.778|
00030a  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;296
00030c  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;296
00030e  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;296
000310  daeb              BGE      |L1.746|
;;;307    	     }
;;;308    	 }
;;;309    	          
;;;310    if(minus=='-')	
000312  f1bc0f2d          CMP      r12,#0x2d
000316  d104              BNE      |L1.802|
;;;311         {
;;;312         s[simb_num++]=minus; 
000318  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00031a  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1
00031c  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
00031e  f807c000          STRB     r12,[r7,r0]
                  |L1.802|
;;;313         }    
;;;314    if(des)
000322  b16b              CBZ      r3,|L1.832|
;;;315         {
;;;316         for(i=simb_num;i>des;i--)
000324  b260              SXTB     r0,r4
000326  e005              B        |L1.820|
                  |L1.808|
;;;317              {
;;;318              s[i]=s[i-1];
000328  183d              ADDS     r5,r7,r0
00032a  f8155c01          LDRB     r5,[r5,#-1]
00032e  543d              STRB     r5,[r7,r0]
000330  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;316
000332  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;316
                  |L1.820|
000334  4298              CMP      r0,r3                 ;316
000336  dcf7              BGT      |L1.808|
;;;319              }
;;;320         s[des]='.';
000338  202e              MOVS     r0,#0x2e
00033a  54f8              STRB     r0,[r7,r3]
;;;321         simb_num++;     
00033c  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1
00033e  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.832|
;;;322         }
;;;323    	
;;;324    n=(20*y)+x;
000340  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
000344  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
000348  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
;;;325    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)
00034a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
;;;326    	{
;;;327         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];
00034c  4a2c              LDR      r2,|L1.1024|
00034e  e004              B        |L1.858|
                  |L1.848|
000350  1a0d              SUBS     r5,r1,r0
000352  5c3b              LDRB     r3,[r7,r0]
000354  5553              STRB     r3,[r2,r5]
000356  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;325
000358  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;325
                  |L1.858|
00035a  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;325
00035c  dbf8              BLT      |L1.848|
;;;328    	}
;;;329    
;;;330    
;;;331    
;;;332    }
00035e  e8bd81fe          POP      {r1-r8,pc}
;;;333    
                          ENDP

                  int2lcdyx PROC
;;;334    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;335    void int2lcdyx(unsigned short in,char y,char x,char des)
000362  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;336    {
000364  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000366  4616              MOV      r6,r2
000368  461c              MOV      r4,r3
;;;337    char i;
;;;338    char n;
;;;339    bin2bcd_int(in);
00036a  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;340    bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
00036e  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
000370  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000372  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;341    i=(y*20)+x;
000376  eb050085          ADD      r0,r5,r5,LSL #2
00037a  eb060080          ADD      r0,r6,r0,LSL #2
00037e  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
;;;342    for (n=0;n<5;n++)
000380  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
;;;343    	{ 
;;;344    	if(n<des)
;;;345    		{
;;;346    		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
000382  4b20              LDR      r3,|L1.1028|
000384  4d1e              LDR      r5,|L1.1024|
                  |L1.902|
000386  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;344
000388  d201              BCS      |L1.910|
00038a  5c1a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r0]
00038c  546a              STRB     r2,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.910|
;;;347    		}   
;;;348    	if((n>=des)&&(dig[n]!=0x20))
00038e  d306              BCC      |L1.926|
000390  5c1a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r0]
000392  2a20              CMP      r2,#0x20
000394  d003              BEQ      |L1.926|
;;;349    		{
;;;350    		if(!des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	
000396  b14c              CBZ      r4,|L1.940|
;;;351    		else lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
000398  186e              ADDS     r6,r5,r1
00039a  f8062c01          STRB     r2,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.926|
;;;352       		}   
;;;353    	i--;	
00039e  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
0003a0  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0003a2  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;342
0003a4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;342
0003a6  2805              CMP      r0,#5                 ;342
0003a8  d3ed              BCC      |L1.902|
;;;354    	}
;;;355    }
0003aa  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L1.940|
0003ac  546a              STRB     r2,[r5,r1]            ;350
0003ae  e7f6              B        |L1.926|
;;;356    
                          ENDP

                  sub_bgnd PROC
;;;1216   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1217   void sub_bgnd(char const *adr,char xy,signed char offset)
0003b0  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1218   {
0003b2  4604              MOV      r4,r0
0003b4  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0003b6  4615              MOV      r5,r2
;;;1219   char temp;
;;;1220   temp=find(xy);
0003b8  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1221   
;;;1222   //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;1223   if(temp!=255)
0003bc  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
0003be  d009              BEQ      |L1.980|
;;;1224   while (*adr)
;;;1225   	{
;;;1226   	lcd_buffer[temp+offset]=*adr++;
0003c0  4a0f              LDR      r2,|L1.1024|
;;;1227   	temp++;
0003c2  e004              B        |L1.974|
                  |L1.964|
0003c4  1943              ADDS     r3,r0,r5              ;1226
0003c6  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1              ;1226
0003c8  54d1              STRB     r1,[r2,r3]            ;1226
0003ca  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
0003cc  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.974|
0003ce  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;1224
0003d0  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;1224
0003d2  d1f7              BNE      |L1.964|
                  |L1.980|
;;;1228       	}
;;;1229   }
0003d4  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1230   
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd PROC
;;;1021   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1022   void int2lcd(unsigned short in,char xy,char des)
0003d6  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1023   {
0003d8  460d              MOV      r5,r1
0003da  4614              MOV      r4,r2
;;;1024   char i;
;;;1025   char n;
;;;1026   
;;;1027   bin2bcd_int(in);
0003dc  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;1028   bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
0003e0  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
0003e2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0003e4  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;1029   i=find(xy);
0003e8  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0003ea  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1030   for (n=0;n<5;n++)
0003ee  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
;;;1031   	{
;;;1032      	if(!des&&(dig[n]!=' '))
0003f0  4a04              LDR      r2,|L1.1028|
;;;1033      		{
;;;1034      		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	 
0003f2  4d03              LDR      r5,|L1.1024|
                  |L1.1012|
0003f4  b954              CBNZ     r4,|L1.1036|
0003f6  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]            ;1032
0003f8  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20              ;1032
0003fa  d007              BEQ      |L1.1036|
0003fc  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
0003fe  e01a              B        |L1.1078|
                  |L1.1024|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.1028|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L1.1032|
                          DCD      zero_on
                  |L1.1036|
;;;1035      		}
;;;1036      	else 
;;;1037      		{
;;;1038      		if(n<des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
00040c  42a1              CMP      r1,r4
00040e  d202              BCS      |L1.1046|
000410  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000412  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
000414  e00f              B        |L1.1078|
                  |L1.1046|
;;;1039      		else if (n==des)
000416  d108              BNE      |L1.1066|
;;;1040      			{
;;;1041      			lcd_buffer[i]='.';
000418  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
00041c  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;1042      			lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
00041e  eb050600          ADD      r6,r5,r0
000422  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000424  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
000428  e005              B        |L1.1078|
                  |L1.1066|
;;;1043      			} 
;;;1044      		else if ((n>des)&&(dig[n]!=' ')) lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];   		
00042a  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
00042c  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
00042e  d002              BEQ      |L1.1078|
000430  182e              ADDS     r6,r5,r0
000432  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.1078|
;;;1045      		}  
;;;1046   		
;;;1047   	i--;	
000436  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000438  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00043a  1c49              ADDS     r1,r1,#1              ;1030
00043c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1030
00043e  2905              CMP      r1,#5                 ;1030
000440  d3d8              BCC      |L1.1012|
;;;1048   	}
;;;1049   }
000442  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1050   
                          ENDP

                  ptr_carry PROC
;;;1239   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1240   char ptr_carry(signed int in,unsigned char modul,signed int carry)
000444  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
;;;1241   {
;;;1242   signed int tempSI;
;;;1243   tempSI=in;                                                             
;;;1244   tempSI+=carry;
;;;1245   if(tempSI<0)tempSI+=modul;
000446  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000448  da01              BGE      |L1.1102|
00044a  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1
00044c  e002              B        |L1.1108|
                  |L1.1102|
;;;1246   else if(tempSI>=modul)tempSI-=modul;
00044e  4288              CMP      r0,r1
000450  db00              BLT      |L1.1108|
000452  1a40              SUBS     r0,r0,r1
                  |L1.1108|
;;;1247   
;;;1248   return (char)tempSI;
000454  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
;;;1249   }
000456  4770              BX       lr
;;;1250   
                          ENDP

                  event2ind PROC
;;;358    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;359    void event2ind(char num, char simbol)
000458  e92d4ffe          PUSH     {r1-r11,lr}
;;;360    {
00045c  4604              MOV      r4,r0
00045e  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;361    char iii;
;;;362    char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;363    unsigned int tempii;    
;;;364    		
;;;365    tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
000460  f44f6060          MOV      r0,#0xe00
000464  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_int
;;;366    tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));
000468  4262              RSBS     r2,r4,#0
00046a  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
00046c  f7fffffe          BL       ptr_carry
;;;367    tempii*=32;
000470  0140              LSLS     r0,r0,#5
;;;368    tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
000472  f5006480          ADD      r4,r0,#0x400
;;;369         
;;;370    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
000476  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
000478  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00047a  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;371    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
00047e  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
000480  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
000484  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;372    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
000488  4669              MOV      r1,sp
00048a  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
00048e  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;373    
;;;374    iii=find(simbol);
000492  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000494  f7fffffe          BL       find
000498  4683              MOV      r11,r0
;;;375         
;;;376    if(dt[0]=='U')
00049a  f89d0008          LDRB     r0,[sp,#8]
00049e  2640              MOVS     r6,#0x40              ;366
;;;377        { 
;;;378        if(dt[2]=='R')
;;;379       		{
;;;380        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';
;;;381       		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ê';
;;;382        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='ë';
;;;383       		}
;;;384

;;;824        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;825        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';     		
;;;826        		} 
;;;827        	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' '; 
;;;828     //   	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;829        	
;;;830        	if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;831        		{

;;;833        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';

;;;836        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';

;;;838        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;839        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';

;;;850        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';

;;;858    		}    	
;;;859        	}
;;;860

;;;910    
                          ENDP

                  community2lcd PROC
;;;911    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;912    void community2lcd(char* in,
001358  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;913    			char xy,
;;;914    			char flash_pos,
;;;915    			char flash_on)
;;;916    {
00135a  4604              MOV      r4,r0
00135c  4608              MOV      r0,r1
00135e  4616              MOV      r6,r2
001360  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;917    char temp;
;;;918    char i;
;;;919    //char n;
;;;920    
;;;921    
;;;922    i=find(xy);
001362  f7fffffe          BL       find
001366  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;923    
;;;924    //in1=192;
;;;925    
;;;926    //in2=34;
;;;927    
;;;928    
;;;929    
;;;930    temp=i;
001368  4610              MOV      r0,r2
;;;931    
;;;932    //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;933    if(temp!=255)
;;;934    while (*in)
;;;935    	{
;;;936    	lcd_buffer[temp]=*in++;
00136a  4d0b              LDR      r5,|L1.5016|
00136c  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff              ;933
00136e  d104              BNE      |L1.4986|
001370  e006              B        |L1.4992|
                  |L1.4978|
001372  5429              STRB     r1,[r5,r0]
001374  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1
;;;937    	temp++;
001376  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
001378  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.4986|
00137a  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;934
00137c  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;934
00137e  d1f8              BNE      |L1.4978|
                  |L1.4992|
;;;938        	}
;;;939    
;;;940    
;;;941    
;;;942    if((bFL2)&&(flash_on))
001380  4806              LDR      r0,|L1.5020|
001382  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; bFL2
001384  2800              CMP      r0,#0
001386  d004              BEQ      |L1.5010|
001388  2f00              CMP      r7,#0
00138a  d002              BEQ      |L1.5010|
;;;943    	{
;;;944    	lcd_buffer[i+flash_pos]=95;
00138c  205f              MOVS     r0,#0x5f
00138e  1991              ADDS     r1,r2,r6
001390  5468              STRB     r0,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.5010|
;;;945    	}
;;;946    
;;;947    }
001392  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
                  |L1.5012|
                          DCD      sm_mont
                  |L1.5016|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.5020|
                          DCD      bFL2
                          ENDP

                  ip2lcd PROC
;;;949    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;950    void ip2lcd(	short in1,
0013a0  e92d4ff0          PUSH     {r4-r11,lr}
;;;951    			short in2,
;;;952    			short in3,
;;;953    			short in4,
;;;954    			char xy,
;;;955    			char flash_pos)
;;;956    {
0013a4  4607              MOV      r7,r0
0013a6  e9dd0509          LDRD     r0,r5,[sp,#0x24]
0013aa  4688              MOV      r8,r1
0013ac  4691              MOV      r9,r2
0013ae  469a              MOV      r10,r3
;;;957    char i;
;;;958    //char n;
;;;959    
;;;960    //bin2bcd_int(in);
;;;961    //bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
;;;962    i=find(xy);
0013b0  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;963    
;;;964    //in1=192;
;;;965    
;;;966    //in2=34;
;;;967    
;;;968    if((flash_pos==1)&&(bFL2))
0013b4  4bff              LDR      r3,|L1.6068|
;;;969    	{
;;;970    	lcd_buffer[i-12]=' ';
0013b6  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
0013b8  4cff              LDR      r4,|L1.6072|
;;;971    	lcd_buffer[i-13]=' ';
;;;972    	lcd_buffer[i-14]=' ';
;;;973    	}
;;;974    else 
;;;975    	{
;;;976    	lcd_buffer[i-12]=0x30+(in1%10);
0013ba  220a              MOVS     r2,#0xa
;;;977    	lcd_buffer[i-13]=0x30+(in1/10)%10;
;;;978    	lcd_buffer[i-14]=0x30+(in1/100);
0013bc  f04f0c64          MOV      r12,#0x64
0013c0  2d01              CMP      r5,#1                 ;968
0013c2  d108              BNE      |L1.5078|
0013c4  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]            ;968  ; bFL2
0013c6  b136              CBZ      r6,|L1.5078|
0013c8  1826              ADDS     r6,r4,r0              ;970
0013ca  f1a6060e          SUB      r6,r6,#0xe            ;970
0013ce  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]            ;970
0013d0  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]            ;971
0013d2  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]            ;972
0013d4  e015              B        |L1.5122|
                  |L1.5078|
0013d6  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2             ;976
0013da  fb027e1b          MLS      lr,r2,r11,r7          ;976
0013de  1826              ADDS     r6,r4,r0              ;976
0013e0  f10e0e30          ADD      lr,lr,#0x30           ;976
0013e4  f806ec0c          STRB     lr,[r6,#-0xc]         ;976
0013e8  fb9bfef2          SDIV     lr,r11,r2             ;977
0013ec  fb02bb1e          MLS      r11,r2,lr,r11         ;977
0013f0  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30         ;977
0013f4  f806bc0d          STRB     r11,[r6,#-0xd]        ;977
0013f8  fb97f7fc          SDIV     r7,r7,r12
0013fc  3730              ADDS     r7,r7,#0x30
0013fe  f8067c0e          STRB     r7,[r6,#-0xe]
                  |L1.5122|
;;;979    	}
;;;980    
;;;981    if((flash_pos==2)&&(bFL2))
001402  2d02              CMP      r5,#2
001404  d108              BNE      |L1.5144|
001406  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001408  b136              CBZ      r6,|L1.5144|
;;;982    	{
;;;983    	lcd_buffer[i-8]=' ';
00140a  1826              ADDS     r6,r4,r0
00140c  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
001410  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;984    	lcd_buffer[i-9]=' ';
001412  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;985    	lcd_buffer[i-10]=' ';
001414  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
001416  e016              B        |L1.5190|
                  |L1.5144|
;;;986    	}
;;;987    else 
;;;988    	{
;;;989    	lcd_buffer[i-8]=0x30+(in2%10);
001418  fb98f7f2          SDIV     r7,r8,r2
00141c  fb028b17          MLS      r11,r2,r7,r8
001420  1826              ADDS     r6,r4,r0
001422  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
001426  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30
00142a  f886b002          STRB     r11,[r6,#2]
;;;990    	lcd_buffer[i-9]=0x30+(in2/10)%10;
00142e  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2
001432  fb02771b          MLS      r7,r2,r11,r7
001436  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
00143a  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;991    	lcd_buffer[i-10]=0x30+(in2/100);
00143c  fb98f7fc          SDIV     r7,r8,r12
001440  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001444  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.5190|
;;;992    	}
;;;993    
;;;994    if((flash_pos==3)&&(bFL2))
001446  2d03              CMP      r5,#3
001448  d108              BNE      |L1.5212|
00144a  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
00144c  b136              CBZ      r6,|L1.5212|
;;;995    	{
;;;996    	lcd_buffer[i-4]=' ';
00144e  1826              ADDS     r6,r4,r0
001450  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
001454  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;997    	lcd_buffer[i-5]=' ';
001456  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;998    	lcd_buffer[i-6]=' ';
001458  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
00145a  e016              B        |L1.5258|
                  |L1.5212|
;;;999    	}
;;;1000   else 
;;;1001   	{
;;;1002   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=0x30+in3%10;
00145c  fb99f7f2          SDIV     r7,r9,r2
001460  fb029817          MLS      r8,r2,r7,r9
001464  1826              ADDS     r6,r4,r0
001466  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
00146a  f1080830          ADD      r8,r8,#0x30
00146e  f8868002          STRB     r8,[r6,#2]
;;;1003   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=0x30+(in3/10)%10;
001472  fb97f8f2          SDIV     r8,r7,r2
001476  fb027718          MLS      r7,r2,r8,r7
00147a  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
00147e  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1004   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=0x30+(in3/100);
001480  fb99f7fc          SDIV     r7,r9,r12
001484  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001488  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.5258|
;;;1005   	}
;;;1006   
;;;1007   if((flash_pos==4)&&(bFL2))
00148a  2d04              CMP      r5,#4
00148c  d109              BNE      |L1.5282|
00148e  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001490  b13b              CBZ      r3,|L1.5282|
;;;1008   	{
;;;1009   	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';
001492  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
;;;1010   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=' ';
001494  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4
001496  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2
00149a  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1011   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=' ';
00149c  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]
                  |L1.5278|
;;;1012   	}
;;;1013   else 
;;;1014   	{
;;;1015   	lcd_buffer[i]=0x30+in4%10;
;;;1016   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=0x30+(in4/10)%10;
;;;1017   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=0x30+(in4/100);
;;;1018   	}
;;;1019   }
00149e  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
                  |L1.5282|
0014a2  fb9af1f2          SDIV     r1,r10,r2             ;1015
0014a6  fb02a311          MLS      r3,r2,r1,r10          ;1015
0014aa  3330              ADDS     r3,r3,#0x30           ;1015
0014ac  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]            ;1015
0014ae  fb91f3f2          SDIV     r3,r1,r2              ;1016
0014b2  fb021113          MLS      r1,r2,r3,r1           ;1016
0014b6  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4              ;1016
0014b8  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2              ;1016
0014bc  3130              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x30           ;1016
0014be  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]            ;1016
0014c0  fb9af1fc          SDIV     r1,r10,r12            ;1017
0014c4  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1017
0014c8  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]            ;1017
0014ca  e7e8              B        |L1.5278|
;;;1020   
                          ENDP

                  long2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1051   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1052   void long2lcdhyx(unsigned long in,char y,char x)
0014cc  b517              PUSH     {r0-r2,r4,lr}
;;;1053   {
;;;1054   char i;
;;;1055   char n;
;;;1056   
;;;1057   i=(20*y)+x;
0014ce  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
0014d2  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
0014d6  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0
;;;1058   
;;;1059   n=*((char*)&in);
0014d8  f89d3000          LDRB     r3,[sp,#0]
;;;1060   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
0014dc  48b7              LDR      r0,|L1.6076|
0014de  f003010f          AND      r1,r3,#0xf
0014e2  5c44              LDRB     r4,[r0,r1]
0014e4  49b4              LDR      r1,|L1.6072|
0014e6  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1061   i--;
0014e8  1e52              SUBS     r2,r2,#1
0014ea  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1062   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
0014ec  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
0014f0  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
0014f2  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1063   i--;
0014f4  1e52              SUBS     r2,r2,#1
0014f6  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1064   
;;;1065   n=*(((char*)&in)+1);
0014f8  f89d3001          LDRB     r3,[sp,#1]
;;;1066   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
0014fc  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
001500  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
001502  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1067   i--;
001504  1e52              SUBS     r2,r2,#1
001506  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1068   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001508  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
00150c  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
00150e  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1069   i--;
001510  1e52              SUBS     r2,r2,#1
001512  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1070   
;;;1071   n=*(((char*)&in)+2);
001514  f89d3002          LDRB     r3,[sp,#2]
;;;1072   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001518  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
00151c  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
00151e  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1073   i--;
001520  1e52              SUBS     r2,r2,#1
001522  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1074   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001524  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001528  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
00152a  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1075   i--;
00152c  1e52              SUBS     r2,r2,#1
00152e  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
;;;1076   
;;;1077   n=*(((char*)&in)+3);
001530  f89d2003          LDRB     r2,[sp,#3]
;;;1078   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001534  f002040f          AND      r4,r2,#0xf
001538  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
00153a  54cc              STRB     r4,[r1,r3]
;;;1079   i--;
00153c  1e5b              SUBS     r3,r3,#1
00153e  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
;;;1080   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001540  eb001012          ADD      r0,r0,r2,LSR #4
001544  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
001546  54c8              STRB     r0,[r1,r3]
;;;1081   i--;
;;;1082   }
001548  bd1e              POP      {r1-r4,pc}
;;;1083   
                          ENDP

                  char2lcdh PROC
;;;1084   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1085   void char2lcdh(char in,char yx)
00154a  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1086   {
00154c  4604              MOV      r4,r0
00154e  4608              MOV      r0,r1
;;;1087   char i;
;;;1088   
;;;1089   i=find(yx);
001550  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1090   
;;;1091   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in%16];
001554  4a99              LDR      r2,|L1.6076|
001556  f004010f          AND      r1,r4,#0xf
00155a  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
00155c  4996              LDR      r1,|L1.6072|
00155e  540b              STRB     r3,[r1,r0]
;;;1092   i--;
001560  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
001562  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
;;;1093   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in/16];
001564  eb021214          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSR #4
001568  7812              LDRB     r2,[r2,#0]
00156a  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
;;;1094   i--;
;;;1095   }
00156c  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;1096   
                          ENDP

                  char2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1097   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1098   void char2lcdhyx(char in,char y,char x)
00156e  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1099   {
;;;1100   char i;
;;;1101   
;;;1102   i=(20*y)+x;
001570  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
001574  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
001578  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;1103   
;;;1104   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in%16];
00157a  4a90              LDR      r2,|L1.6076|
00157c  f000030f          AND      r3,r0,#0xf
001580  5cd4              LDRB     r4,[r2,r3]
001582  4b8d              LDR      r3,|L1.6072|
001584  545c              STRB     r4,[r3,r1]
;;;1105   i--;
001586  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
001588  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;1106   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in/16];
00158a  eb021010          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSR #4
00158e  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
001590  5458              STRB     r0,[r3,r1]
;;;1107   i--;
;;;1108   }
001592  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;1109   
                          ENDP

                  int2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1110   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1111   void int2lcdhyx(unsigned short in,char y,char x)
001594  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1112   {
;;;1113   char i;
;;;1114   
;;;1115   i=(20*y)+x;
001596  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
00159a  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
00159e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;1116   
;;;1117   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in%16];
0015a0  4b86              LDR      r3,|L1.6076|
0015a2  f000020f          AND      r2,r0,#0xf
0015a6  4c84              LDR      r4,|L1.6072|
0015a8  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
0015aa  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
;;;1118   i--;
0015ac  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
0015ae  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;1119   in/=16;
0015b0  0902              LSRS     r2,r0,#4
;;;1120   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in%16];
0015b2  f002000f          AND      r0,r2,#0xf
0015b6  5c18              LDRB     r0,[r3,r0]
0015b8  5460              STRB     r0,[r4,r1]
;;;1121   i--;
0015ba  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
0015bc  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
;;;1122   in/=16;
0015be  0911              LSRS     r1,r2,#4
;;;1123   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in%16];
0015c0  f001020f          AND      r2,r1,#0xf
0015c4  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
0015c6  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
;;;1124   i--;
0015c8  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
0015ca  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
;;;1125   in/=16;
0015cc  0909              LSRS     r1,r1,#4
;;;1126   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in];
0015ce  5c59              LDRB     r1,[r3,r1]
0015d0  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
;;;1127   
;;;1128   }
0015d2  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;1129   
                          ENDP

                  char2lcdbyx PROC
;;;1130   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1131   void char2lcdbyx(char in,char y,char x)
0015d4  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1132   {
;;;1133   char i;
;;;1134   
;;;1135   i=(20*y)+x;
0015d6  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
0015da  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
0015de  b2cc              UXTB     r4,r1
;;;1136   
;;;1137   lcd_buffer[i--]=ABCDEF[in%2];
0015e0  4976              LDR      r1,|L1.6076|
0015e2  f0000201          AND      r2,r0,#1
0015e6  5c8d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r2]
0015e8  1e62              SUBS     r2,r4,#1
0015ea  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
0015ec  4a72              LDR      r2,|L1.6072|
0015ee  5515              STRB     r5,[r2,r4]
;;;1138   in/=2;
0015f0  0844              LSRS     r4,r0,#1
;;;1139   lcd_buffer[i--]=ABCDEF[in%2];
0015f2  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
0015f6  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
0015f8  1e58              SUBS     r0,r3,#1
0015fa  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0015fc  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
;;;1140   in/=2;
0015fe  0864              LSRS     r4,r4,#1
;;;1141   lcd_buffer[i--]=ABCDEF[in%2];
001600  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
001604  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
001606  1e43              SUBS     r3,r0,#1
001608  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
00160a  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
;;;1142   in/=2;
00160c  0864              LSRS     r4,r4,#1
;;;1143   lcd_buffer[i--]=ABCDEF[in%2];
00160e  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
001612  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
001614  1e58              SUBS     r0,r3,#1
001616  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001618  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
;;;1144   in/=2;
00161a  0864              LSRS     r4,r4,#1
;;;1145   lcd_buffer[i--]=ABCDEF[in%2];
00161c  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
001620  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
001622  1e43              SUBS     r3,r0,#1
001624  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
001626  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
;;;1146   in/=2;
001628  0864              LSRS     r4,r4,#1
;;;1147   lcd_buffer[i--]=ABCDEF[in%2];
00162a  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00162e  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
001630  1e58              SUBS     r0,r3,#1
001632  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001634  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
;;;1148   in/=2;
001636  0863              LSRS     r3,r4,#1
;;;1149   lcd_buffer[i--]=ABCDEF[in%2];
001638  f0030401          AND      r4,r3,#1
00163c  5d0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r4]
00163e  1e44              SUBS     r4,r0,#1
001640  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
001642  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
;;;1150   in/=2;
001644  0858              LSRS     r0,r3,#1
;;;1151   lcd_buffer[i--]=ABCDEF[in%2];
001646  5c08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r0]
001648  5510              STRB     r0,[r2,r4]
;;;1152   in/=2;
;;;1153   }
00164a  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1154   
                          ENDP

                  pointer_set PROC
;;;1155   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1156   void pointer_set(char num_of_first_row)
00164c  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1157   {
;;;1158   if(sub_ind==index_set)lcd_buffer[num_of_first_row*20]=1;
00164e  495c              LDR      r1,|L1.6080|
001650  2401              MOVS     r4,#1
001652  4b59              LDR      r3,|L1.6072|
001654  f9912001          LDRSB    r2,[r1,#1]  ; a_ind
001658  f9911004          LDRSB    r1,[r1,#4]  ; a_ind
00165c  428a              CMP      r2,r1
00165e  d104              BNE      |L1.5738|
001660  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
001664  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]
;;;1159   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+1))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+1)*20]=1;
;;;1160   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+2))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+2)*20]=1;
;;;1161   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+3))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+3)*20]=1;
;;;1162   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+4))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+4)*20]=1;
;;;1163   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+5))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+5)*20]=1;
;;;1164   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+6))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+6)*20]=1;
;;;1165   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+7))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+7)*20]=1;
;;;1166   }
001668  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5738|
00166a  1c4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#1              ;1159
00166c  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1159
00166e  d105              BNE      |L1.5756|
001670  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;1159
001672  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1159
001676  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1159
00167a  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5756|
00167c  1c8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#2              ;1160
00167e  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1160
001680  d105              BNE      |L1.5774|
001682  1c80              ADDS     r0,r0,#2              ;1160
001684  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1160
001688  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1160
00168c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5774|
00168e  1ccd              ADDS     r5,r1,#3              ;1161
001690  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1161
001692  d105              BNE      |L1.5792|
001694  1cc0              ADDS     r0,r0,#3              ;1161
001696  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1161
00169a  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1161
00169e  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5792|
0016a0  1d0d              ADDS     r5,r1,#4              ;1162
0016a2  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1162
0016a4  d105              BNE      |L1.5810|
0016a6  1d00              ADDS     r0,r0,#4              ;1162
0016a8  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1162
0016ac  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1162
0016b0  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5810|
0016b2  1d4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#5              ;1163
0016b4  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1163
0016b6  d105              BNE      |L1.5828|
0016b8  1d40              ADDS     r0,r0,#5              ;1163
0016ba  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1163
0016be  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1163
0016c2  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5828|
0016c4  1d8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#6              ;1164
0016c6  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1164
0016c8  d105              BNE      |L1.5846|
0016ca  1d80              ADDS     r0,r0,#6              ;1164
0016cc  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1164
0016d0  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1164
                  |L1.5844|
0016d4  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5846|
0016d6  1dc9              ADDS     r1,r1,#7              ;1165
0016d8  428a              CMP      r2,r1                 ;1165
0016da  d1fb              BNE      |L1.5844|
0016dc  1dc0              ADDS     r0,r0,#7              ;1165
0016de  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1165
0016e2  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1165
0016e6  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1167   
                          ENDP

                  tree_down PROC
;;;1169   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1170   void tree_down(signed char offset_ind,signed char offset_sub_ind)
0016e8  4b36              LDR      r3,|L1.6084|
;;;1171   {
;;;1172   ind_pointer--;
0016ea  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
0016ec  1e52              SUBS     r2,r2,#1
;;;1173   ind_pointer+=offset_ind;
0016ee  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
0016f0  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
0016f2  8018              STRH     r0,[r3,#0]
;;;1174   a_ind=b_ind[ind_pointer];
0016f4  4a34              LDR      r2,|L1.6088|
0016f6  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
0016fa  4402              ADD      r2,r2,r0
0016fc  4830              LDR      r0,|L1.6080|
0016fe  6813              LDR      r3,[r2,#0]
001700  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; a_ind
001702  7912              LDRB     r2,[r2,#4]
001704  7102              STRB     r2,[r0,#4]
;;;1175   
;;;1176   sub_ind+=offset_sub_ind;
001706  7842              LDRB     r2,[r0,#1]  ; a_ind
001708  4411              ADD      r1,r1,r2
00170a  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1177   }
00170c  4770              BX       lr
;;;1178   
                          ENDP

                  tree_up PROC
;;;1179   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1180   void tree_up(char tind, char tsub_ind, char tindex_set, char tsub_ind1)
00170e  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1181   {
;;;1182   b_ind[ind_pointer++]=a_ind;
001710  4d2c              LDR      r5,|L1.6084|
001712  f9b54000          LDRSH    r4,[r5,#0]  ; ind_pointer
001716  1c66              ADDS     r6,r4,#1
001718  802e              STRH     r6,[r5,#0]
00171a  4d2b              LDR      r5,|L1.6088|
00171c  eb040484          ADD      r4,r4,r4,LSL #2
001720  4425              ADD      r5,r5,r4
001722  4c27              LDR      r4,|L1.6080|
001724  6826              LDR      r6,[r4,#0]  ; a_ind
001726  602e              STR      r6,[r5,#0]
001728  7926              LDRB     r6,[r4,#4]  ; a_ind
00172a  712e              STRB     r6,[r5,#4]
;;;1183   ind=(i_enum)tind;
00172c  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]
;;;1184   sub_ind=tsub_ind;
00172e  7061              STRB     r1,[r4,#1]
;;;1185   index_set=tindex_set;
001730  7122              STRB     r2,[r4,#4]
;;;1186   sub_ind1=tsub_ind1;
001732  70a3              STRB     r3,[r4,#2]
;;;1187   }
001734  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1188   
                          ENDP

                  bgnd_par PROC
;;;1189   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1190   void bgnd_par(char const *ptr0,char const *ptr1,char const *ptr2,char const *ptr3)
001736  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;1191   {
00173a  4680              MOV      r8,r0
00173c  460f              MOV      r7,r1
00173e  4616              MOV      r6,r2
;;;1192   char i,*ptr_ram;
;;;1193   clr_scrn();
001740  f7fffffe          BL       clr_scrn
;;;1194   
;;;1195   ptr_ram=lcd_buffer;
001744  4c1c              LDR      r4,|L1.6072|
;;;1196   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001746  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
                  |L1.5960|
;;;1197   	{
;;;1198   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr0++;
001748  f8180b01          LDRB     r0,[r8],#1
00174c  f8040b01          STRB     r0,[r4],#1
001750  1c6d              ADDS     r5,r5,#1              ;1196
001752  b2ed              UXTB     r5,r5                 ;1196
001754  2d14              CMP      r5,#0x14              ;1196
001756  d3f7              BCC      |L1.5960|
;;;1199   	}
;;;1200   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001758  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
                  |L1.5978|
;;;1201   	{
;;;1202   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr1++;
00175a  f8171b01          LDRB     r1,[r7],#1
00175e  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
001762  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;1200
001764  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1200
001766  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1200
001768  d3f7              BCC      |L1.5978|
;;;1203   	}
;;;1204   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
00176a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
                  |L1.5996|
;;;1205   	{
;;;1206   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr2++;
00176c  f8161b01          LDRB     r1,[r6],#1
001770  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
001774  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;1204
001776  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1204
001778  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1204
00177a  d3f7              BCC      |L1.5996|
;;;1207   	}
;;;1208   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
00177c  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
                  |L1.6014|
;;;1209   	{
;;;1210   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr3++;
00177e  f8131b01          LDRB     r1,[r3],#1
001782  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
001786  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;1208
001788  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1208
00178a  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1208
00178c  d3f7              BCC      |L1.6014|
;;;1211   	}
;;;1212   
;;;1213   
;;;1214   }
00178e  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;1215   
                          ENDP

                  show_mess PROC
;;;1231   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1232   void show_mess(char* p1, char* p2, char* p3, char* p4,int m_sec)
001792  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1233   {
001794  9c02              LDR      r4,[sp,#8]
;;;1234   bgnd_par(p1,p2,p3,p4);
001796  f7fffffe          BL       bgnd_par
;;;1235   tree_up(iSM,sub_ind,sub_ind1,sub_ind2);
00179a  4809              LDR      r0,|L1.6080|
00179c  78c3              LDRB     r3,[r0,#3]  ; a_ind
00179e  7882              LDRB     r2,[r0,#2]  ; a_ind
0017a0  7841              LDRB     r1,[r0,#1]  ; a_ind
0017a2  20a3              MOVS     r0,#0xa3
0017a4  f7fffffe          BL       tree_up
;;;1236   ret((char)(m_sec/100));
0017a8  2064              MOVS     r0,#0x64
0017aa  fb94f0f0          SDIV     r0,r4,r0
0017ae  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0017b0  e00c              B        |L1.6092|
0017b2  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.6068|
                          DCD      bFL2
                  |L1.6072|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.6076|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L1.6080|
                          DCD      a_ind
                  |L1.6084|
                          DCD      ind_pointer
                  |L1.6088|
                          DCD      b_ind
                  |L1.6092|
0017cc  e8bd4010          POP      {r4,lr}
0017d0  f7ffbffe          B.W      ||ret||
;;;1237   }
;;;1238   
                          ENDP

                  event_data2ind PROC
;;;1251   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1252   void event_data2ind(char num, char simbol)
0017d4  e92d43fe          PUSH     {r1-r9,lr}
;;;1253   {
0017d8  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;1254   char iii;
;;;1255   char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;1256   unsigned int tempii;    
;;;1257   		
;;;1258   /*tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
;;;1259   tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));*/
;;;1260   tempii=(signed)num;
;;;1261   tempii*=32;
0017da  0140              LSLS     r0,r0,#5
;;;1262   tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
0017dc  f5006480          ADD      r4,r0,#0x400
;;;1263        
;;;1264   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
0017e0  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
0017e2  4620              MOV      r0,r4
0017e4  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1265   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
0017e8  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
0017ea  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
0017ee  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1266   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
0017f2  4669              MOV      r1,sp
0017f4  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
0017f8  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1267   
;;;1268   iii=find(simbol);
0017fc  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0017fe  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1269   
;;;1270   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
001802  2620              MOVS     r6,#0x20
001804  4c30              LDR      r4,|L1.6344|
001806  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1
001808  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00180a  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1271   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
00180c  2730              MOVS     r7,#0x30
00180e  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1
001810  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001812  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1272   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
001814  f04f0821          MOV      r8,#0x21
001818  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1
00181a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00181c  f8048000          STRB     r8,[r4,r0]
;;;1273   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
001820  f04f0940          MOV      r9,#0x40
001824  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1
001826  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001828  f8049001          STRB     r9,[r4,r1]
;;;1274   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
00182c  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1
00182e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001830  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1275   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
001832  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1
001834  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001836  5466              STRB     r6,[r4,r1]
;;;1276   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
001838  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1
00183a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00183c  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1277   lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
00183e  2223              MOVS     r2,#0x23
001840  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1
001842  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
001844  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
;;;1278   int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
001846  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]
00184a  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
00184c  2121              MOVS     r1,#0x21
00184e  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1279   int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
001852  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]
001856  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
001858  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23
00185a  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1280   if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
00185e  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
001862  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
001864  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc
001866  d302              BCC      |L1.6254|
001868  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00186a  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]
                  |L1.6254|
;;;1281   sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0); 
00186e  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
001872  4916              LDR      r1,|L1.6348|
001874  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
001876  eb010080          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #2
00187a  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
00187c  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
;;;1282   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';		
001880  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1
001882  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001884  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1283   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
001886  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1
001888  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00188a  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1284   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
00188c  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1
00188e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001890  f8048001          STRB     r8,[r4,r1]
;;;1285   lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
001894  223a              MOVS     r2,#0x3a
001896  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1
001898  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00189a  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
;;;1286   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
00189c  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1
00189e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0018a0  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1287   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
0018a2  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1
0018a4  b2cd              UXTB     r5,r1
0018a6  f8049000          STRB     r9,[r4,r0]
;;;1288   int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
0018aa  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
0018ae  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
0018b0  2121              MOVS     r1,#0x21
0018b2  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1289   int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
0018b6  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
0018ba  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
0018bc  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
0018be  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1290      		     		
;;;1291   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
0018c2  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1292   }	
0018c4  e8bd83fe          POP      {r1-r9,pc}
                          ENDP
